hero.title: About Inaash
hero.description: Is an interactive training and awareness program to educate and raise awareness about emergency health and sports injuries and the proper ways to deal with them

target.title: Target Audience
target.description: The program is aimed at all members of the community starting from the age of 8 years

main.title: Main Goal
main.description: To provide awareness and education about health and sports emergencies in order to provide the necessary assistance to individuals before they reach health centers or other medical facilities, and to avoid life-threatening accidents using technology
main.sub-description: The principle is to build a healthier life, free from cardiovascular diseases, stroke, and major sports injuries, and to educate the individual on how to save lives and have a disease-free life and live healthy while encouraging the community to attend first aid, CPR, and sports first responder courses

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.description: Enhance the ability of community members to deal with emergencies, learn, and provide assistance

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.description: The program is designed to provide emergency response training through fun and interactive scenario-based videos. The platform covers both health and sports injuries, aiming to educate users about the basic skills to deal with emergencies. Key features include real-time questions on how to deal with the situation, the ability to track progress, performance evaluation, and obtaining a certificate upon completion of the training program. Our platform ensures a seamless user experience with options to update personal data, verify certificates, and share achievements on social media. The platform targets a wide audience, ranging from 8 to 60 years old, and enhances learning in a fun and interactive way with a focus on life-saving skills

updates.title: Challenges
updates.description: Many individuals lack adequate training to deal with health and sports emergencies. Traditional methods are often inaccessible and routine. There is a need for an interactive platform that provides easily accessible and comprehensive training for emergencies.

card.title: You Scored 100%
card.description: Interactive Awareness Program for Health Emergencies

solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.description: The Inaash platform provides a fun technological solution for emergency response training through interactive scenario-based educational videos. Users learn health and sports emergency skills at their own pace. The platform features real-time tests, progress tracking, and performance evaluations to keep users engaged. Upon completion of the program, users can obtain certificates and easily verify their achievements and share their results on social media. This solution, designed for a wide audience, provides a modern and flexible way to equip individuals with essential life-saving skills and address the limitations of traditional training methods

first.title: Watch Course Videos
first.description: Start your journey by watching the interactive training program videos designed for sharing and teaching practical skills

second.title: Answer Questions
second.description: Test your understanding by answering questions between each video

third.title: Progress
third.description: With each completed lesson, you can track your progress and deepen your knowledge

fourth.title: Get Your Certificate
fourth.description: Successfully complete all modules and assessments to receive a training program completion certificate

fifth.title: Share Your Achievement
fifth.description: Celebrate your success! Share your certificate and program achievements on social media

why-us.title: Why Inaash?
why-us.description: We are committed to providing fun training that equips you with essential emergency response skills

our-partners.title: Our Partners
our-partners.description: We are proud to partner with leading organizations to deliver high-quality emergency response training, ensuring effective and modern practices for health and sports-related situations

rating.title: Help us improve your experience
rating.description: Your opinion matters to us! Answer these quick questions to help us improve the test and platform experience

rating-list.1: How would you rate the ease of use of the test interface in general?
rating-list.2: Do the questions reflect real-life scenarios well enough to improve your understanding?
rating-list.3: How satisfied are you with the responsiveness and clarity of the video content?
rating-list.4: Was the progress tracking (hearts, correct answers, time) helpful during the test?

rating.textarea-placeholder: Tell us more about your experience!
